name: Everything hates you
description:
Reimagening of the arcade-classic asteroids.

Why are you reading this? The game is right there! Go play it!

Also please note that you cant manouver the menu with a controller.

Okay... If you don't wanna play it you could also just read about all the incredible features!

You move with either WASD or the arrrow keys

If you have a controler connected to your computer you can play with it as well!

If you do you'll shoot wherever you push the right stick, if not you'll shoot toward your mouse.

You got four different spacecrafts to choose from as well as

Eight achievements to unlock!

Still reading?

I'll tell you what the achievements are:

•Destroy 100 venusses

•Destroy 100 Marses

•Destroy 100 Mercurys

•destroy 500 Venusses

•Destroy 500 Marses

•Destroy 500 Mercurys

•Destroy 1000 Mercurys

•Destroy 10000 Mercurys

Or whatever the plural of mars is...

That's anything I have right now!

Hope you'll enjoy!

If you're still not in the mood to play you could also just read this again.
